data.title: Wayland, Michigan Population 2024
data.text:
Wayland is a city located in Allegan County, Barry County, and Kent County Michigan. Wayland has a 2024 population of 4,501. Wayland is currently growing at a rate of 0.38% annually and its population has increased by 1.56% since the most recent census, which recorded a population of 4,432 in 2020.

The average household income in Wayland is $75,359 with a poverty rate of 7.27% . The median age in Wayland is 33.5 years: 35.9 years for males, and 30.9 years for females.

Wayland Demographics

According to the most recent ACS, the racial composition of Wayland was:

White : 87.74%

Black or African American : 5.03%

Two or more races : 4.96%

Asian : 1.29%

Other race : 0.59%

Native American : 0.39%

Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander : 0%
